## IStandardDebugFlags interface

The debug flags included with rc-js-util

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IStandardDebugFlags
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [DEBUG\_DISABLE\_BREAKPOINT](./rc-js-util.istandarddebugflags.debug_disable_breakpoint.md) | "DEBUG\_DISABLE\_BREAKPOINT" | Prevents hitting assert / error breakpoints, useful when debugging tests. |
|  [DEBUG\_DISABLE\_EXPENSIVE\_CHECKS](./rc-js-util.istandarddebugflags.debug_disable_expensive_checks.md) | "DEBUG\_DISABLE\_EXPENSIVE\_CHECKS" | Disable debug checks that do not run in constant time. |
|  [DEBUG\_MODE](./rc-js-util.istandarddebugflags.debug_mode.md) | "DEBUG\_MODE" | This can be set in dead code removal tools to trim debug code. |
|  [DEBUG\_VERBOSE\_MEMORY\_MANAGEMENT](./rc-js-util.istandarddebugflags.debug_verbose_memory_management.md) | "DEBUG\_VERBOSE\_MEMORY\_MANAGEMENT" | Enable verbose logging of memory allocations, very chatty. |
|  [DEBUG\_VERBOSE](./rc-js-util.istandarddebugflags.debug_verbose.md) | "DEBUG\_VERBOSE" | Enable verbose logging. |
